alert.note: Alert for White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 3:56AM MST until December 29 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6500 feet, with greatest accumulation between Wednesday morning and Wednesday afternoon. Total snow accumulations will range from 3 to 11 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Alpine, Pinetop-Lakeside and Show Low. * WHEN...From 5 AM Wednesday to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will be closer to 7000 feet initially, before dropping towards 6500 Wednesday evening. Snow forecast from 5 AM Wednesday to 5 AM Thursday: Alpine 3 to 5 inches Pinetop-Lkside 3 to 5 inches Show Low 1 to 2 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
